com.github.flowersinthesand.spheres

Interface Protocol

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PortalProtocol, ProtocolSupport

    public interface Protocol
    The Protocol provides HttpSocket, WsSocket and SessionBase.
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
